generatedTitle: Overview of the Draw for UEFA Euro 2020

extractFactDictList.question: When is the 2020 European Football Championship scheduled to take place?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The 2020 European Football Championship, commonly referred to as UEFA Euro 2020, is scheduled to take place from June 12 to July 12, The tournament will be the 16th edition of the European Championship, and it will feature 24 national teams from UEFA member countries.

extractFactDictList.question: How many national teams will participate in the 2020 European Football Championship?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The tournament will be the 16th edition of the European Championship, and it will feature 24 national teams from UEFA member countries.

extractFactDictList.question: Where and when is the draw for the European Championships 2020 scheduled to take place?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The draw for the European Championships 2020 is scheduled to take place on November 30, 2019, at 18:00 CET (Central European Time) in Bucharest, Romania.
extractFactDictList.phrase: November 30, 2019, at 18:00 CET in Bucharest, Romania

extractFactDictList.question: How many teams will be in each pot for the draw of the European Championships 2020?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The draw for the European Championships 2020 will feature 24 teams, which will be divided into four pots based on their UEFA national team rankings.

extractFactDictList.question: Who will conduct the draw for the European Championships 2020?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The draw for the European Championships 2020 will be conducted by UEFA's draw committee, which is composed of representatives from each of the 24 participating teams.
